channel.title: [SHOW-OFF]Ventrix Trailer
channel.description:
This in no way advertises this server, it is simply a trailer showing off my progress through my server Ventrix.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDuY0Xu6Of4
Please rate it out of 10.

item.title: [SHOW-OFF]Ventrix Trailer
item.dc:creator: @VentrixRSPS VentrixRSPS
item.description:
@VentrixRSPS wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:14, topic:417181”][quote author=VentrixRSPS link=topic=519120.msg3776440#msg3776440 date=1318127236]

It’s quite obvious this is PI because of the tree models. Forgive me if I’m wrong but I know PI has this problem because it’s some sort of little "anti-leech’.

Good luck with the development though, the video editing was decent but still a bit boring to me overall.

@Fridder, depends which tree, normal tree is model 1570.

Soul, PI has the same problem because they are loading 508 models, the 508 tree models have texture problems and considering I loaded 602 models they have the same problem too, all I have to do is dump the 317 models for trees and replace them.
[/quote]
This is why you don’t load higher cache revisions into a 317 client. There are always bugs with the content… Have you ever looked at 317 loading 474? There’s so many bugs client-sided, I was disgusted.[/quote]

You do realise I am not loading another revision cache? I am just loading data FROM a higher revision.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOW-OFF]Ventrix Trailer
item.dc:creator: @VentrixRSPS VentrixRSPS
item.description:
@VentrixRSPS wrote:

Instead of basing your replies on the trees, base it on the editing of the video and the feature of the server.

The base is Emulous 3.0, RiotScape release by Lmctruck30 on Rune-Server in 2008 and the client base is from scratch.
